issue.title: Erratic vehicle behavior when breaks are applied and when accelerating

content.raw:
What surface were you on? On the road, the friction is limited by the tires to 1.0, but on the grass plane, the friction is 0.5.

I had added a wheel lock-up feature at low speed (less than 0.5 m/s) with high braking (over 70%) to try to prevent drift when the vehicle is stationary. What if you decrease the braking to 50% just before you stop?

See [DRCVehiclePlugin.cc:852-871](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/d9183cb065bb2c658c63d6d237de313943f4aaa2/plugins/DRCVehiclePlugin.cc?at=default#cl-852).
content.html:
What surface were you on? On the road, the friction is limited by the tires to 1.0, but on the grass plane, the friction is 0.5.

I had added a wheel lock-up feature at low speed (less than 0.5 m/s) with high braking (over 70%) to try to prevent drift when the vehicle is stationary. What if you decrease the braking to 50% just before you stop?

See DRCVehiclePlugin.cc:852-871.
